attributes.action: Do not make all schools academies.
attributes.additional_details: Schools are a place for learning and developing our children and not to make money from. Our teachers are some of the best in the world and work tirelessly for our children. Making a school an academy will not benefit the majority of schools.
attributes.background:
The government plans to make all schools academies. Schools and their students should have the choice on their future. If a school
Is achieving an outstanding Ofsted status then why change something that a government body says is over achieving? Not every organisation needs to make a profit.
